full-pick-text: A new iPad comes in a new color for its line

text: A new iPad mini is introduced with a refreshed design, new colours previously not a part of the product, USB-C, Smart Connector, and 5G support
full-pick-text: A new iPad mini is introduced with a refreshed design, new colours previously not a part of the product, USB-C, Smart Connector, and 5G support
notes:
• Originally a Risky Pick.
  • This was very close to coming true, but it was missing a Smart Connector.

text: A new iPad Pro will feature...
full-pick-text: A new iPad Pro will feature a front-facing camera on the landscape side, higher than 27W fast charging, and eventually support more than 4 windows in the same Stage Manager workspace
notes:
• "... a front-facing camera on the landscape side, higher than 27W fast charging, and eventually support more than 4 windows in the same Stage Manager workspace."
  • Before the episode, this pick also included the detail of some models coming with more than 16 GB of RAM, but in keeping with the new, less outlandish tone of risky picks, Myke asked that it be toned down a bit.

full-pick-text: An updated iPad Air comes in at least one new color

notes: • At the time of picking there were not any developer APIs for Stage Manager on either macOS or iPadOS, so anything will be "new".

text: Apple showcases at least one new feature coming in iOS or iPadOS 14.1
full-pick-text: Apple showcases at least one new feature coming in iOS or iPadOS 14.1
notes: • The version number wasn't stated explicitly, otherwise Fitness+ would have counted.

text: Apple unveils a new iPad, not Pro
full-pick-text: Apple unveils a new iPad, not Pro

text: Apple will bring back some kind of "app list/launcher" UI element on iPad
full-pick-text: Apple will bring back some kind of "app list/launcher" UI element on iPad
notes:
• Federico cites parts of Slide Over's new multitasking interface, and when that doesn't seem to be working, says "If you don't give me this point, I will call the police." It escalates to the point of typing 911 into his phone.
  • "Some kind of" is vague enough to count this, and it definitely is not because of the threat.

text: Apple will release a new programming app for iPad
full-pick-text: Apple will release a new programming app for iPad
notes:
• Federico asks to be quoted as "very very positive" that he will win on the strength of this Ricky Pick.
  • Not Swift Playgrounds, that is not new. As it turns out, they added this functionality to Swift Playgrounds.
  • This was deemed not a reuse of a previous pick since it is even riskier and more specific.

notes:
• "(The app can be universal.)"
  • After years of waiting, Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro come to iPad in 2023.

full-pick-text: Apple will release its biggest iPad ever with a display of at least 16 inches. It won't be OLED, it'll have the front-facing camera on the landscape side, and two USB-C ports at least. It'll be called iPad Studio.
notes: • "... It won't be OLED, it'll have the front-facing camera on the landscape side, and two USB-C ports at least. It'll be called iPad Studio."

full-pick-text: The next version of iPadOS will introduce a brand new audio routing system, with support for selecting different input sources, similar to macOS. This feature will finally allow podcasters like me to record local audio while also being on a FaceTime or Zoom call (assuming apps add support for it).
notes:
• "... This feature will finally allow podcasters like me to record local audio while also being on a FaceTime or Zoom call (assuming apps add support for it)."
  • And there's even more that isn't graded: "Devices that do not require drivers will work out of the box, like in macOS. I think the Sounds page of Settings will be redesigned."
  • Federico guesses that this is his longest-ever Risky Pick, and he's right, this is in fact his longest ever pick period, beating out this one from earlier the same year.
